name: Seeking An Audience
Lore: '''With your wisdom, I''m sure that we can work out an arrangement which will be mutually beneficial and enable us to avoid any unpleasant confrontation.''',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Once during each of your turns, may deploy one Underworld Contacts, [JP] Lando, [JP] Leia, R2-D2, or C-3PO from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Also, while Luke is at a Jabba''s Palace site, opponent''s aliens there must use +1 Force to use their landspeed.',
